Structure that is shared with 1\-S\-P. Before jumping to 1\-S\-P, this structure will be locked to read-\/only.

\subsection{Detailed Description}
Structure that is shared with 1\-S\-P. Before jumping to 1\-S\-P, this structure will be locked to read-\/only.
